Title: Prostate cancer: Cabazitaxel - A key therapeutic option in prostate cancer
Abstract: © 2015 Macmillan Publishers Limited. All rights reserved.Treatment with cabazitaxel is associated with improved survival in patients with metastatic castration-resistant prostate cancer. Bahl et al. recently reported that patient-reported quality-of-life metrics were stable-with a trend towards improvements with increasing numbers of treatment cycles-in 112 patients treated with cabazitaxel in the UK.
